definition: رجم raiama u (raim) to stone (ه a.o.); to curse, damn, abuse, revile (ه s.o.) │رجم بالغيب (gaib) to talk about s.th. of which one knows nothing; to guess, surmise, make conjectures; to predict the future II رجم بالغيب do. رجم rajm stoning; (pl. رجم rujam) missile │ رجم بالغيب (gaib) conjecture, guesswork; prophecy رجم rujum shooting stars, meteorites
